feedback: Deriv’s primary requirement for alignment and visibility was solved by TopGearPerform.com
name: Rakshit Choudhary
review: We looked at a few choices, and while testing, we found Profit.co met all our needs, and the support from TopGearPerform.com team made the choice easier.
heading: Deriv chooses TopGearPerform.com to implement OKRs
description: In a competitive business environment, it is crucial to dream big, achieve more, and push the boundaries further. High growth and achievement aren’t for companies who want to lead the pack and find success – it’s for survival in today’s shifting global economies.

feedback: TopGearPerform.com is continually improving the system and making it better based on feedback.
name: Jonathan Freeman
review: TopGearPerform is continually improving the system and making it better based on feedback.
heading: Centura Wealth Advisory Chooses TopGearPerform.com OKR
description: For companies of all sizes and in all industries, OKRs— or, Objectives and Key Results– can provide the focus and alignment that they need to eliminate silos, optimize strategy execution, and achieve more of their most important goals.

feedback: With TopGearPerform.com, it’s very clear. The interface is good, it’s organized well, it flows well.
name: Colin O’Neill CEO & Co-Founder
review: With TopGearPerform, it’s very clear. The interface is good, it’s organized well, it flows well…When our clients say “what do you recommend” we recommend Profit.co’s features.
heading: Strategic Ops consulting
description: Though it began as the goal-setting framework used by industry-leading technology companies, the OKR framework is now heralded as the agile methodology that companies of all sizes use across many, many verticals.Objectives and Key Results have helped a number of high-profile companies launch their most important initiatives and close the gap between their strategy and their execution. Two champions of the OKR framework are Nishant Sasidharan and Colin O’Neill, respectively the COO and CEO of Strategic Ops Consulting, as well as the company’s co-founders.

feedback: What TopGearPerform.com really helped with is being able to communicate a lot quicker and in a lot more effective manner.
name: Chase Winters
review: What TopGearPerform.com really helped with is being able to communicate a lot quicker and in a lot more effective manner.
heading: Green House
description: No matter the size of your company or the industry you operate in, OKRs– or, Objectives and Key Results– can help you manage growth, monitor your business performance, and set stretch goals to help you achieve more than you believed possible.  We had the opportunity to sit down with Chase Winters, the VP of Finance at Greenhouse. This Canadian-based organization is a functional health and wellness company. They began with a single warehouse producing cold-pressed juices. Over the course of seven to eight years, Greenhouse has expanded into different markets, selling products at numerous store locations as well as in grocery stores and online.
